channel.title: Kazenga Lua Lua on
channel.description: Recent content in Kazenga Lua Lua on

item.title: Would you let Kazenga Lua Lua quit Newcastle United?
item.description: Kazenga - Needs regular playing time but not getting it at Newcastle United 20 years of age and has played 4 times for Newcastle United seniors and the supposed brother of Newcastle United former, Lomano Lua Lua. That would be Kazenga Lua Lua, the Congolese winger who hasn’t made a real breakthrough at the Toon for the last couple of years. Today he joined Brighton & Hove Albion on loan for an initial 1 month.
